Key Match Events: Axar Patel took three wickets off just eight deliveries
Suryakumar Yadav completed his half-century off just 22 balls
Arshdeep Singh dismissed Kusal Mendis and Wanindu Hasaranga
Riyan Parag bowled the last two batters on consecutive deliveries to restrict Sri Lanka to 170 runs
Pre-Game Insights: India's head coach Gautam Gambhir and newly appointed full-time T20I captain Suryakumar Yadav started their campaign with a 43-run win over Sri Lanka
India won the toss and decided to field
Post-Match Reflections: Charith Asalanka, Sri Lanka's captain, said they were not up to the mark in the powerplay but came back strongly in the latter part of the game
Suryakumar Yadav, India's captain, praised the opposition's brand of cricket and mentioned that the team was fortunate with no dew affecting the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch looked good and might get slower once the ball loses its hardness
There were some cracks on the surface which bowlers can use
The wind was blowing and the atmosphere was cool and pleasant
